topic.title: Installing the Content Fusion Connector Plugin

keywords.indexterm: Installing the Content Fusion Connector plugin

body.p:
As the Content Author, to install the Content Fusion Connector plugin, follow these steps:
In Oxygen XML Editor or Oxygen XML Author, go to Help Install new add-ons to open an add-on selection dialog box.
Select the --ALL AVAILABLE SITES-- from the drop-down menu.
Select Content Fusion Connector plugin and click Next.
Select the I accept all terms of the end user license agreement option and click Finish.
Restart the application.
Result: The Show Content Fusion Task Manager button should now be available on the toolbar. Clicking it will open the Content Fusion Task Manager view.
